text: Ovvor atmavum, tan ceyta nanmaikalum; innum, tan ceyta timaikalum anta(t tirppu) nalil tanmunkontu varappattatum, atu tan ceyta timaikkum tanakkum itaiye veku turam irukka ventume enru virumpum;. Allah tannaipparri ninaivu kurumaru unkalai eccarikkinran;. Innum allah tan atiyarkal mitu karunai utaiyonaka irukkinran
